metadata.title: CVE-2016-2156 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
calendar/externallib.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13,2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 providescalendar-event data without considering whether an activity is hidden,which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information viaa web-service request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2156` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.3+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
